title: The Legend of Korra Season 2
alternative_title: Avatar: Legend of Korra; The Legend of Korra (Book 2:Spirits)
description: Book Two: Spirits, is set six months later. Its premiere episodes focus on the conflict between the human and the spirit world, between the Southern and Northern Water Tribe, and between the Northern Tribe's chief Unalaq and his banished brother, Korra's father Tonraq.
